0.1.name: wordpress/wp-restful-categories-plugin
0.1.description:
What is it?

This is a plugin to be used with WP-RESTful Plugin for WordPress, it is not a direct WordPress Plugin. This will not work unless you have WP-RESTful installed and active on your WordPress Installation. By using this plugin your REST API will be able to return Categories information.

Widget

This Plugin also comes with a fully functional Widget that will enable you to list your connected servers Categories.

Plugin features?

  • Share categories information through the API.

Requirements?

You need to have WP-RESTful installed and active for this Plugin to work.
